Articles.Content: Looks great. I am looking forward to using these parts.
tip: if youhave tweakable everything, i think you can reverse the gimbal effect on engines, so they gimbal in the reverse direction, letting you use them infront of CoM

> 
> tip: if youhave tweakable everything, i think you can reverse the gimbal effect on engines, so they gimbal in the reverse direction, letting you use them infront of CoM

yah, might be useful for engines placed above CoM.
I really love this mod and your other projects too. Really looking forward to the release of the new parts. Awesome work!

updated to KSP 1.1.2,

technically haven't changed anything as Stork mod works just fine with new KSP version

GitHub Link go to version 0.2.4...

Btw thanks, awesome mod.

> 
> 
> 35 minutes ago, Aerospacer said:
> 
> 
> GitHub Link go to version 0.2.4...
> 
>

> Btw thanks, awesome mod.

cheers, it's corrected now.
Awesome, I finally found another mod that makes it easy to deliver MKS parts ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D")

Greetings.

I have asked [@riocrokite](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/129319-riocrokite/) permission to update / continue / adopt / release this wonderful mod.

Hopefully I hear back from [@riocrokite](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/129319-riocrokite/) with an answer, but in case I don't I intend to respectfully proceed to adopt this mod for curation as permitted by the individual licenses of this mod.

Thank you.
